tool_description: API for parsing telephone number and making it human readable. Associate phone numbers with countries and make placeholders
name: Format Phone Number
title: Format Phone Number

api_list.name: Get phone placeholder and code
api_list.description: Returns phone number format and country code of provided country
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://format-phone-number.p.rapidapi.com/phone/code/tw"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "format-phone-number.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://format-phone-number.p.rapidapi.com/phone/code/{countryiso}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "format-phone-number.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Parse phone number
api_list.description: Returns provided phone number information like country name, code and more

api_list.name: Get Countries
api_list.description: Returns list of localised Countries with phone-related data like country code, localised name, name in English and more . Also it  detects and returns default country by client's IP-address, or by provided country code by parameter.
